info.title: Firma Partner API
info.description:
RESTful API for document signing and template management.

**Authentication**: All endpoints require API key authentication via the `Authorization` header in the format `Bearer your-api-key`.

**Security Features**:
- Input validation using Zod schemas with detailed field-level error messages
- Rate limiting: 100 requests per minute per API key + IP address combination
- Request size limits: 5MB for standard endpoints, 10MB for embedded template operations
- RSA-256 signed JWT tokens for embedded template access

**Rate Limiting**: When rate limits are exceeded, the API returns a `429 Too Many Requests` response with headers indicating when to retry:
- `X-RateLimit-Limit`: Maximum requests allowed per minute
- `X-RateLimit-Remaining`: Number of requests remaining in current window
- `X-RateLimit-Reset`: Unix timestamp when the rate limit resets
- `Retry-After`: Seconds until the rate limit resets

**Error Handling**: All errors return structured JSON responses with `error` (human-readable message), `code` (machine-readable identifier), and `details` (field-level validation errors when applicable).

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for authentication. Format: 'Bearer your-api-key'

JWTAuth.description: JWT token authentication for embedded template access

details.description: Field-level validation errors (present only for 400 Bad Request responses)

get.description: Retrieve all document templates for your team with pagination support.

page_size: Page size must be between 1 and 100

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - API key does not have required permissions

413.description: Payload Too Large - Request exceeds 5MB limit

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

example.error: Rate limit exceeded. Maximum 100 requests per minute.

name: Name is required
Name must be less than 255 characters

get.description: Retrieve a specific template with full resource details.

404.description: Not Found - Template does not exist

post.description: Create a new signing request based on this template.
